FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Got questions? We've got you covered—find all the answers here!

faq.question: What makes EchoTribe AI different from other music creation apps?
faq.answer:
Unlike any other music app, EchoTribe is your AI-powered viral launchpad.

From vocals and lyrics to full tracks and short-form clips, our Viral Engine transforms raw ideas into share-worthy songs in seconds. With AI tools for beat selection, harmonization, hook generation, and trend optimization, you don't need to master production—or the algorithm. Just bring your creativity—we'll amplify it.

faq.question: Do I need to know anything about music marketing?
faq.answer: Nope. EchoTribe AI is built for artists who want to create, not market. Our AI handles everything that makes music trend—from structure to social format.

faq.question: What if I don't understand trends?
faq.answer: That's the point. Our Viral Engine and TrendSignal study social platforms in real time and adjust your music output for you. You focus on your art—we'll help it rise.

faq.question: Can I use my own lyrics and vocals?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload your original vocals and lyrics to customize your music. Your AI co-producer helps bring them to life.

faq.question: Is EchoTribe AI suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Absolutely! No prior music production knowledge is needed—just your creativity, and EchoTribe AI does the rest.

faq.question: Can I share my music?
faq.answer: Yes! Export and share your tracks instantly to social media or collaborate with other artists.
